description:
I am a software engineer with expertise in mobile and web applications development. I build cutting-edge web and mobile apps ranging from e-commerce, multimedia, and travel booking portals which are intuitive, and also being scalable and efficient behind the scenes.
I enjoy constantly learning and improving my skills with the technologies that keep evolving in this ever-changing field!
I also help in facilitating and mentoring beginner and experienced Android developer with Andela's Google Africa Scholarship.
Here's a few things I'm experienced with:
skills: Framework - Android SDK, iOS SDK, JAX-RS, Jersey
Web Servers - Nginx, Apache Tomcat, Glassfish
Platform & Tools - AWS(EC2, S3, SNS/SES, Route53), Docker, Git
